DOC.brief_summary: This single center , open-label , randomize study investigate drug-drug interaction potential multiple dos RO7033877 multiple dose colistin methanesulfonate sodium ( CMS ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Clinical Study Healthy Volunteers Investigate Drug-drug Interaction Between Multiple Doses RO7033877 Multiple Doses Colistin Methanesulfonate Sodium ( CMS )
DOC.criteria: Adult male female ( non childbearing potential ) healthy volunteer 18 55 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 Non smoker Use adequate contraception method Evidence active chronic disease Regular consumption drug abuse Infection human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B ( HBV ) hepatitis C ( HCV ) History significant allergic reaction Abnormal blood pressure Clinically significant abnormality ( e.g . cardiovascular , laboratory value )
